Title: AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE THE SUM OF THIRTY-SIX THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE OPERATING EXPENSES OF THE BRANCH COLLEGE OT LIBERAL ARTS CREATED BY ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTY-SIX, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Data:
[ Act No. 3667, December 08, 1929 ]
AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE THE SUM OF THIRTY-SIX THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE OPERATING EXPENSES OF THE BRANCH COLLEGE OT LIBERAL ARTS CREATED BY ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTY-SIX, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The sum of thirty-six thousand pesos is hereby appropriated out of any funds in the Insular Treasury, not otherwise appropriated, for the initial operating expenses of the branch college of Liberal Arts created by Act Numbered Twenty-nine hundred and fifty-six. The operating expenses of this branch college in the succeeding years shall be included in the annual appropriation for the university of the Philippines in the General Appropriation Law.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, December 8, 1929.
